column4: hello all, weird issue NetworkManager seems to not remember conection configs
currently it has nothing under the wired tab in the GUI though there are files under system-connections
ifconfig eth0 up and down appear to work but I still can not ping
can any one think of anything that Ive missed?
both return the unknown host error
are you configuring manually or using dhcp?
what does your resolv.conf contain now?
#Generated by NetworkManager and the 3 ip's for the nameservers
ya that was it, dont know what it was but I moved resolv and then did it by hand and things are back up again
